resources.string: Your task in this game is to guess the number I choose between 1 and a maximum number specified in Settings. You can ask whether a number is greater than or less than or equal to some number. There are two modes in this game (also can be chosen in Settings) that you can play. Basic mode, which means that I don\'t cheat and don\'t change the number as you ask questions about it and try to guess it. In Smart mode I cheat, so it takes you a bit more time to get the number (also, don\'t try to guess it before you know it for sure :)). Good luck!
